com.opengamma.strata.product.swap

Interface NotionalPaymentPeriod

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PaymentPeriod
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CapitalIndexedBondPaymentPeriod, FixedCouponBondPaymentPeriod, RatePaymentPeriod

    public interface NotionalPaymentPeriod
extends PaymentPeriod
    A period over which interest is accrued with a single payment calculated using a notional.

    This is a single payment period within a swap leg. The amount of the payment is defined by implementations of this interface. It is typically based on a rate of interest.

    This interface imposes few restrictions on the payment periods. It extends PaymentPeriod to require that the period is based on a notional amount.

    Implementations must be immutable and thread-safe beans.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CurrencyAmount getNotionalAmount()
      The notional amount, positive if receiving, negative if paying.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.opengamma.strata.product.swap.PaymentPeriod

        adjustPaymentDate, collectIndices, getCurrency, getEndDate, getPaymentDate, getStartDate

    • Method Detail

      • getNotionalAmount

        CurrencyAmount getNotionalAmount()
        The notional amount, positive if receiving, negative if paying.

        This is the notional amount applicable during the period. The currency may differ from that returned by PaymentPeriod.getCurrency(), for example if the swap contains an FX reset.

        Returns:
        the notional amount of the period
